title: Railworks TS2014 AP36 ECML London to Peterborough Scenario Pack
description:
Armstrong Powerhouse presents a scenario pack for the ECML London to Peterborough route. From high speed East Coast/Grand Central 'HST' services to more leisurely First Capital Connect workings, these eight scenarios give a well rounded experience of present day (2013) passenger operations on this route.

In these scenarios, we've strived for realism in all areas. For example, each scenario represents actual workings using the 2013 timetable to create an as realistic experience as possible. As well as this, prototypical formations are used where possible with all services having their headcode, time of leaving, origin and destination as their name so you can see which train is which!

Requirements

Extra Stock

RS.com ECML London to Peterborough 

Armstrong Powerhouse BAA/BZA Wagon Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse Class 321 Electric Multiple Unit Pack 

Armstrong Powerhouse JHA Wagon Pack 

RS.com European Community Asset Pack 

RS.com Settle to Carlisle

Thomson Interactive Class 170 

ENJOY GUYS AND SEEDDDDDD!!!!
